summary: HR generalist with experience in recruitment, attendance management system, payroll processing, MIS, and employee engagement; skilled in SAP HR/payroll, employee master data management, and end-to-end HR operations; proficient in Microsoft Office and leveraging online search and networks for hiring; strong focus on process improvement and engagement.

experience.title: Sr. Team Member HR
experience.description: Recruitment: Handling end to end recruitment process single handedly for IT, Strategic Projects, HR, Procurement, F&A, Admin, and Sales departments; recruited for Contract/Flexi, Permanent, IJPs and employee transfers.

experience.title: HR Executive
experience.description: Selection ratio management; updating & creating job descriptions; coordination with hiring managers; posting on job portals; developed MINT system to track recruitment workflow; sourcing candidates via portals, social media, employment agencies, and referrals; interview scheduling and processing; offer letters and medical check-ups; joining logistics; SAP hiring data and IJP management; MIS & reporting.

experience.title: HR Generalist
experience.description: End-to-end HR operations including recruitment lifecycle, onboarding, payroll processing (SAP ECC 6) for ~2500 employees, employee master data management in SAP HCM, attendance and payroll submissions; MIS, reporting and analytics; employee engagement initiatives; IJP and bench-marking; training and development; compliance with statutory labor laws.

education.degree: Master of Science: Human Resource Management

education.school: MIT School of Business, City, State, India

certifications: FSMS Lead Auditor Course by URS, Delhi (2011)
